website_summaries.verdict: If price-point isn’t a factor and you’re looking for a robot vacuum to help you maintain multiple flooring types in your home, the Roomba 790 is an effective, low-maintenance purchase.
pros: The charming Roomba 790 cleans your home reasonably well, requiring little human intervention past programming and dustbin emptying
cons: Its navigational decision making sometimes results in longer cleaning cycles than you might want, and at $699 the Roomba 790 much more than some alternatives

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love it! All the cat hair, dirt, grass and everything else on my floor is gone! All I have to do is turn it on. It is programmable, but if prefer to turn it on when I can pay attention in case it eats a sock or something. It does have some trouble finding its base to recharge but that is far outweighed by the fact that my floor is really clean! And I don't have to spend time or energy to haves clean floor.
customer_reviews.author: Dmab

customer_reviews.title: Great edition
customer_reviews.text: This is the third Roomba I've had, and it's far and away the best. Does a great job of maintaining floors; picks up a lot of dirt and pet hair. Comes with replacement parts which I haven't needed yet. Start using this with a clean floor, and it will work great.
customer_reviews.author: P. Rivers

customer_reviews.title: Gotta have one
customer_reviews.text: I love my Roomba!!! I have multiple long hair animals, dogs and cats, leading to hair being all over the place. The Roomba vacuums all of my floors, keeping the hair at a manageable level. I also have to say that I had a problem with my Roomba and contacted the company; they were quick to fix the problem. Thinking of getting my parents one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's great, auto vacuums my home without ever lifting a ...
customer_reviews.text: I should have purchased one of these YEARS AGO. It's great, auto vacuums my home without ever lifting a finger.
customer_reviews.author: DZ Louie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Roomba - I've worn out the other 2. I can't say enough good about it and this one is the best so far. It cleans hard floors well, carpets too - it just drains the battery faster on carpet. I like the ability to schedule it and love the remote control. Wouldn't be without one!
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: ... present for another but the one I own works great.
customer_reviews.text: A present for another but the one I own works great.
customer_reviews.author: Salty

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but worth it because it works beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! After watching the VERY comprehensive video that came with this product, I was set to wrap it back up and return it as it appeared to be more work than it was worth. In reality, I plugged it in and let it fully charge, then hit the Clean button, and this little gem did and emaculate job on my entire first floor! Gotta love that. Now I'm going to check out their wet-vac version. I think I've just cut down my housekeeping staff's hours by a huge margin. Wish they had one that did toilets ; )
customer_reviews.author: ThinkmanTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: (Just kidding of course) Works fine. My only issue is that it wanders randomly ...
customer_reviews.text: It won't do my dishes. I thought this would do my dishes. How the heck am I going to get my dishes cleaned? (Just kidding of course) Works fine. My only issue is that it wanders randomly TOO much. I wish it would behave a little more predictably so I could cordon off my kid an cats predictably. Otherwise it's a continuous battle of "get out of there!" and "that is not a toy!" Also, it would be nice if it could climb rugs that were just a bit tall. If you have rugs that are taller than 1/4 inch, it seems it may have trouble getting on to the rug.
customer_reviews.author: hazenaj

customer_reviews.title: I gave as a present to my son and he ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave as a present to my son and he loves it---I plan to buy one for myself to replace my 15 yr. old one that is very cumbersome
customer_reviews.author: Edda G.

customer_reviews.title: Thought this would be another expensive gimmicky toy- Its fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: Thought this would be another expensive gimmicky toy- Its fantastic!!! Love having my home vacuumed every day while Im at work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Very happy with it. Keeps the place clean between the weekly vacuuming.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was really good and useful as I expected it.

customer_reviews.title: great buy works well.
customer_reviews.text: has to grow on you , but it does the job ! in a few days you can really see the difference it does , you need to dump the tray a bunch because it works and picks up a bunch !

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: not for whole house cleaning, but works to help keep your house touched up, especially if you have animals and pet hair.

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: We have our Roomba to vacuum three rooms at 6 a.m. on Monday, Wednesday and Friday. It does a pretty good job cleaning up cat and dog hair. Sometimes it doesn't always return to its docking. Also, I wish it had more programmable features and logging. But my wife and I are satisfied.

customer_reviews.title: I like this Roomba
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I like this Roomba; however, it goes crazy sometimes before finally regaining its sanity

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I really like the vacuum. I was disappointed in their documentation that came with it. Also you would think for the price they would provide the "AA" batteries for the remote.

customer_reviews.title: expensive but worth the money
customer_reviews.text: i hope it can be black colored. the remote controller is useless to me, because i have set it auto-run every day.

customer_reviews.title: Good appliance
customer_reviews.text: I consider that is a very useful in a house and i did nt spend in house labors. I recommended it

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Tina does a pretty good job but she tends to get hung up a lot. It bets the heck out of doing it yourself

customer_reviews.title: Roomba 790
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little robot, so much fun to watch it clean my house without me lifting a finger. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Julie Waters

customer_reviews.title: iRobot Roomba 790 Vacuum Cleaning Robot
customer_reviews.text: this is my fourth irobot roomba. this is the newest one in the fleet. it works so good, cleans up wright after my dogs make a mess. if you don't have one of roombas you need to get one. i highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: kjp41

customer_reviews.title: Just Great
customer_reviews.text: I really recommend this product, is just great! It really does the work for me! The floor now looks shiny!
customer_reviews.author: Luisa Marcos

customer_reviews.title: WARRANTY of no value
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 3 months of use@ 3 daily cleanings per week. So the only thing I can conclude is these are cheaply built, but not cheaply priced Chinese ripoffs (e.g. made in China). I had attempted to diagnose as per website, all tests indicated to return for warranty repair. So call for warranty repair, but want you to do the same as you had done with them on phone; impossible only time they are open is when at work. Explained situation and still same robot replies, even managers have canned speeches. So I guess it the garbage can for this piece of JUNK, since their warranty isn't worth the paper it's printed on.
customer_reviews.author: ElecTech

customer_reviews.title: Does excellent on both hardwood and carpet.
customer_reviews.text: This is a third Roomba we have purchased. We usually get the next to latest version when we buy because we cannot afford the newest iRobot. Have to wait until newer ones come out so that we can purchase older ones for a decent price. And as usual, the battery holds a solid, full charge for a few uses, then begins to decline and soon you can only get 30 minutes out of it on a good day.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Roberts

customer_reviews.title: This is great for daily vacuuming
customer_reviews.text: This is great for daily vacuuming, as long as you don't have things on the floor. We keep our house pretty tidy, but if a single cord, cable, or string of any kind is on the floor, the Roomba will almost always get caught on it and stop. Usually easy to untangle though. It also often gets stuck on the edge of small rugs, and gets stuck behind doors in bedrooms and bathrooms. It doesn't replace true vacuuming (we still vacuum once a week), but it's a great daily supplement, and it's nice to come home to see the vacuum lines in the carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice for everyday pick ups
customer_reviews.text: It picks up a decent amount of dog fur, dust, etc. around the house. It's nice to just push a button and have it help out with the cleaning. Obviously it can't get in every nook and seems to randomly go around cleaning so will miss some areas. But it's nice to have to help out with a majority of the cleaning. It can get stuck (in corners, on rugs, etc) at times and needs help getting out. My dog surprisingly doesn't attack it and will tolerate it (and she usually attacks the regular vacuum cleaner). Overall, nice to have but you'll still have to do some deep cleaning yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Evi Gill

customer_reviews.title: Drunken Maid
customer_reviews.text: This product seems to do the job that we need very good. It will cruises for up to 2-3 hours and very rarely has not found its way home. It definitely does let you know if something is left in the wrong place by knocking it over. It has received some battle scars but the Drunken Maid seems to be strong enough to get out from underneath what ever falls on top of it. First one I have owned and would recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: gabent

customer_reviews.title: A Mean, Lean, Vacumming Machine!
customer_reviews.text: There's no better feeling than coming home to a finely vacuumed floor! I've only had this Roomba 790 for 2 days and it was love at first vacuum! Zoomer, as my daughters have named "him", picks up an amazing amount of dirt. He vacuumed yesterday and I accidentally programmed him to vacuum 2 days in a row and I couldn't believe the amount of dirt/hair/etc. that was picked up on the 2nd day! (Both days, really!) The 790 does a very thorough job. I recommend it to anyone who is thinking about purchasing it. Best. Thing. Ever.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Martinez

customer_reviews.title: iRobot Roomba 790 Vacuum Cleaning Robot
customer_reviews.text: Not a Vacuum replacement but its not suppose to be, perfect for the vacuum tasks in between the weekly or even bi weekly cleaning. It detects its surroundings quite well but it does have a problem with bumping roughly off of dark surfaces. took a while to figure out the lighthouses due to lack of instructions but with a little research got it to work pretty well. Was definitely worth the money, extremely satisfied and looking forward to more from this company and their products.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: ... just got it 1 day but my family ready love it the roomba she know what she doing
customer_reviews.text: i just got it 1 day but my family ready love it the roomba she know what she doing, it have me a big time it work good on the laminate floor and carpet too
customer_reviews.author: JAMESBOND007806

customer_reviews.title: Modern Marvel - The Roomba
customer_reviews.text: Who would have thought that modern technology would produce a new vacuum cleaner. From the moment you take it out of the box, press CLEAN, on the remote control, your are amazed at what this innovative piece of engineering can do. It is smart and very effective at its job. Downsides are the price and keeping the device itself clean and running. I have been using mine for several months and it works as good as when I bought it. You will still need a more traditional vacuum for some jobs. If you admire fine engineering and wonderful technology, and can afford the price, don't miss out.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Woods

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product but it's difficult to set up the program to cover the required area
customer_reviews.author: RE/PRO-USA

customer_reviews.title: Wonder Vac
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, easy to setup and easy to use. Amazing how it maneuvers around the edges/ corners of your house and furniture. Definately a must have for a busy household, or for anyone who hates the chore of vacuuming.
customer_reviews.author: Howzat

customer_reviews.title: Does the cleaning for us.
customer_reviews.text: We've named ours "Rose". She does all the carpets while we get on working on our ranch. Handles two dogs, two cats and a great deal of hay and much we bring in from outside. Great cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: S. Spooner

customer_reviews.title: Lazy man's dream
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife at christmas time. Knowing that I broke all the rules pertaining to buying this type of gift, I finally got my answer on the 26th of December. She loves this gift and I have to wonder why I did'nt get smarter sooner. The results are amazing. When mama is happy , everybodies happy!,
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: NEEDS BETTER INSTRUCTIONS
customer_reviews.text: INSTRUCTIONS TOTALLY INADEQUATE. INFO DISC WAS NOT OF ASSISTANCE. WITH WHAT I AM ABLE TO DO WITH IT, IT IS CERTAINLY EFFICIENT AND I LOVE IT WHEN I CAN MAKE IT PERFORM.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Joanna E. Spaulding

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: We have named her "Rachael " and I do t know what I would do without her. It is wonderful coming home from work and the carpets and floors are clean. Not sure how I survived without her all these years
customer_reviews.author: nancyt

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised. We run it five times a week on schedule, and the house is much clearner.
customer_reviews.text: Some preparation was required to get the house "tidy" ensure all strings, cords etc. are cleaned up or the Roomba might become stuck. I think the only issue we have is that the remote control isn't quite as useful as we'd envisaged, it's easier just to pick up and place it.
customer_reviews.author: John Smith

customer_reviews.title: not so good as my expect
customer_reviews.text: Well , it is not so good as it looks like. When it is working, my wire will be eat, such as Mac Air's Charger, blankets and so on, meanwhile, it also need my attention.

customer_reviews.title: get a real vacum

customer_reviews.title: Really enjoying coming home to clean floors.
customer_reviews.text: It is so nice to not see the dog hairs growing over the week. It cleans the floors every day before I get home.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does not transition well between rugs and wood floors. Extremely noisy.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME OR MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this with medium expectations. I've watched this junk pass by very small dirt and pet hair for a month with no avail. I'm only using it on smooth hardware floors. What a joke and a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: julie michels

customer_reviews.title: Awesome - Floors have never looked Better
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit unsure when i started watching it clean as it seemed to have very random movements, We have quite a large house with multiple rooms,it does seem to cover the whole floor area, even without using "Lighthouses". The only negative thing I have to say is the size of the dustbin, even though the floors are regularly cleaned the dustbin had to be emptied after every second or so clean.

customer_reviews.title: Excelent Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I used for 30 days since arrive to my home and its working perfect! , all my floor is now super clean , without pets hair, I am too happy with this

customer_reviews.title: It is amazing technology but a cheap dust bin
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised but the dust bin barely holds one cup. So when it does one carpet area it fills up in minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Its perfect ! I use it a lot ! I planed it three times a week and it serves perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Roomba 790
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Roomba 790 as a gift for my granddaughter, She tells me it works well and she is very pkeased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Fern E. Peterson

product_meta.title: iRobot Roomba 790 Vacuum Cleaning Robot for Pets and Allergies
feature_bullets: Wireless Command Center: makes initiating a cleaning, scheduling and steering Roomba even easier. Using radio frequency technology, you can now command Roomba from any room in your house. Initiate a cleaning, preprogram your cleaning sessions or steer Roomba all from the sleek, lightweight Wireless Command Center.
3-Stage Cleaning with AeroVac Series 2- Roomba 790 picks up an amazing amount of dirt, pet hair and other debris with its patented 3- stage cleaning system and AeroVac bin.
Dual HEPA Filters- Roomba 790's dual HEPA filters trap dust, allergens and tiny particulates leaving behind fresher, cleaner air.
On-board scheduling- The robot can be scheduled to perform up to seven cleaning sessions per week, even when you're not home.

Extended Life Power Management- The robot uses sophisticated power management software that results in 50% longer battery life than previous Roomba generations, ensuring hundreds of cleaning cycles under proper use.
Includes 3 Virtual Wall Lighthouses, Extra Brush Set, Extra Filter Set, Round Brush Cleaning Tool, Flat Brush Cleaning Tool

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars89 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
